Course Schedule

This page displays an outline of the topics, content, and assignments for the term. Each module starts on a Monday. There are no assignments due on Sundays.

Module Date Skills Packages Functions Readings Reference Videos Assignments
1.1 May 22 Read data into R readr, dplyr read_csv(), glimpse() 📖 🖥️🖥️
May 23 Reshape data tidyr pivot_longer() 📖 🖥️
May 24 Clean data dplyr mutate(), mutate_at(), substring() 📖 🖥️🖥️ 📘
1.2 May 25 Download data from an API wbstats, vdemdata, dplyr, janitor wb_data(), vdem, select_(), filter(), case_match(), round_to_fraction() 🖥️🖥️
May 26 Merge data frames countrycode, dplyr , readr countrycode(), left_join(), write_csv() 📖 🖥️🖥️
May 27 Group, summarize and arrange dplyr group_by(), summarize(), arrange() 📖 🖥️ 📘 🧮
2.1 May 29 Bar charts & histograms ggplot2 ggplot(), geom_col(), geom_histogram(), aes(), labs() 🖥️🖥️
May 30 Line charts ggplot2 geom_line() 🖥️
May 31 Scatter plots ggplot2, scales geom_point(), geom_smooth(), scale_x_log10(), label_number(), geom_text() 📖 🖥️ 📘
2.2 Jun 1 Color schemes tidyr, colorBlindess, dplyr, viridis, RColorBrewer drop_na(), cvdPlot(), scale_color_manual(), scale_fill_viridis_d(), scale_fill_brewer(), scale_color_manual(), scale_color_viridis_d(), scale_color_brewer 🖥️
Jun 2 Themes & annotations ggplot2 theme_dark(), theme_minimal(), annotate(), geom_hline(), geom_vline() 🖥️🖥️
Jun 3 Interactivity plotly ggplotly(), layout() 🖥️ 📘 🧮
3.1 Jun 5 Choropleth maps rnaturalearth, ggplot2, ggthemes ne_countries(), geom_sf(), theme_map() 🖥️
Jun 6 Map data ggplot2, viridis theme(), scale_fill_viridis_c() 🖥️
Jun 7 Make a map function eval(), parse(), function(), source() 📖 🖥️ 📘
3.2 Jun 8 Upload UCDP data states, sf sfind(), st_as_sf() 🖥️
Jun 9 Make a leaflet map leaflet leaflet(), addTiles(), addMarkers(), setView() 🖥️
Jun 10 Customize your map leaflet, htmltools awesomeIcons(), addAwesomeMarkers(), addProviderTiles(), sprintf(), lapply(), HTML 🖥️ 📘 🧮
4.1 Jun 12 Exploring tabular data tidycensus, dplyr, stringr, kableExtra census_api_key(), load_variables(), get_acs(), rename(), rename_with, str_remove(), kable(), slice_max(), slice_min(), slice_sample(), bind_rows() 🖥️🖥️
Jun 13 Make a gt table gt gt(), tab_header(), cols_label(), fmt_currency(), tab_source_note(), cols_width(), opt_table_font(), cols_align(), tab_options(), gtsave() 🖥️
Jun 14 Confidence intervals ggplot2 geom_errorbar() 📖 🖥️ 📘
4.2 Jun 15 Display regression tables peacesciencer, broom, dplyr create_stateyears(), add_ucdp_acd(), add_democracy(), add_creg_fractionalization(), add_sdp_gdp(), add_rugged_terrain(), tidy(), mutate_if(), glm(), binomial() 🖥️
Jun 16 Make regression tables modelsummary list(), modelsummary() 🖥️ ✍️
Jun 17 Coefficient plots modelsummary modelplot(), rev() 🖥️ 📘 🧮
5.1 Jun 19 Scatter plot app setup dplyr summarize_all() 🖥️
Jun 20 Building the UI shiny fluidPage(), titlePanel(), sidebarLayout(), sidebarPanel(), selectInput(), mainPanel(), plotOutput() 🖥️
Jun 21 Building the server shiny renderPlot(), shinyApp() 📖 🖥️ 📘
5.2 Jun 22 Line chart app setup fredr fredr_set_key() , as.Date() , Sys.Date() , 🖥️
Jun 23 Building the UI shiny column(), wellPanel(), helpText(), sliderInput() 🖥️ ✍️
Jun 24 Building the server shiny, fredr reactive(), fredr(), fred_indicator() 🖥️ 📘 🧮
